incident_updates.body:
Our technical teams are currently working with our provider to solve the incident.
Our supplier will be carry out operations to resolve the problem.

Our technical teams are currently working with our provider to solve the incident.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Start time : 19/04/2024 18:00 UTC Service impact : You may experienced additional latency between EU and APAC. Ongoing actions : Investigating Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 05/06/2024 05:00 UTC End time : 05/06/2024 09:00 UTC Service impact : Short interruption to all racks with IPMI and management TORS. Loss of redundancy for all equipment in SDGAME racks. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. The PDU supplies the network for the ERI0113A/B/C rows, most of which are redundant, and the MGMT and IPMI TORs will also be affected. The following racks have no redundancy on public tors (SDGAME racks): ERI0113A01A - 20 minutes downtime max ERI0113A01B - 20 minutes downtime max ERI0113A01C - 20 minutes downtime max ERI0113A03A - 20 minutes downtime max The 3 phase power to ERI0113A/B/C servers are fed by separate PDUs so will not be impacted. Thank you for your understanding.
